word:
There is so little sympathy even among our people, so little true backbone, to lift when God would have them lift. If all had personal religion, a living 


                                   -328- 

faith in Jesus for themselves, then we would see solid, unselfish work done under a pressure of difficulties. My heart is often almost broken with sadness and grief as I see the little real harmony cultivated among believers. We have a solemn work before us. Ye are laborers together with God, and may we work intelligently, heartily, with decision and positiveness, that we may be blessed and may bless others.
